channel.title: How do you create a server from a home ip address?
channel.description: :confused: i know my home ip address and i would like to start a server from my ip address to get the best possible connection and stop all the lagging. if anyone reads this and knows how to set up a server from your home ip please reply with the answer. thanks a ton, jeffches :confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 09:10:49 PM[/size][hr]it like auto sets my ip as 127.0.0.1 and it isnt that. its just like a random #. n e 1 know why it does that?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 09:15:44 PM[/size][hr]and once i get this server set up can anyone help me with the main programs and stuff?

item.title: How do you create a server from a home ip address?

item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36663.0.html

item.title: How do you create a server from a home ip address?
item.dc:creator: @jeffches jeffches
item.description:
@jeffches wrote:

ok, thanks for that. i would like to try to set up my own server even though it may be difficult. to everyone who has created their own server, does it cost money to keep the server running?

item.title: How do you create a server from a home ip address?
item.dc:creator: @gungamma gungamma
item.description:
@gungamma wrote:

all this stuff is normal, the ip adress is set defualt to 127.0.0.1(your connection) and so on so just change the ip to a existing server but if you want your own you need to download a source or make your own(tough)

Read full topic
